hero.title: The Art of
hero.description: Curating rare, exceptional timepieces that transcend generations. Every watch has a soul; every soul has a story.

heritage.subtitle: Heritage Stewardship
heritage.title: Beyond Just Keeping Time
heritage.description: We don't just sell watches; we preserve history. Each piece in our collection is hand-selected for its mechanical integrity, historical significance, and soul. Our master watchmakers ensure that every tick remains as precise as the day it left the manufacture.
heritage.story: A watch is more than a tool; it's a story.

curation.title: Curation
curation.description: Meticulously selected for condition, rarity, and historical importance.

restoration.title: Restoration
restoration.description: Service by master horologists using period-correct components.

expertise.subtitle: Expertise
expertise.title: Driven by passion and guided by expertise

classic.title: Classic Elegance
classic.subtitle: Dress Watches
classic.description: Timeless elegance passed through generations. Discover our selection of vintage icons.

lab.subtitle: Precision Engineering
lab.title: The Heart of Excellence
lab.description: Every timepiece we acquire is serviced by master watchmakers who specialize in vintage horology. From microscopic gear alignment to case restoration, we ensure that the mechanical poeticism of the movement remains untainted.

authenticity.title: Guaranteed Authenticity
authenticity.description: Every timepiece undergoes a rigorous 30-point inspection and authentication by our master watchmakers.

warranty.title: 12-Month Mechanical Warranty
warranty.description: We stand behind our collection with a comprehensive one-year warranty on all mechanical movements.

shipping.title: Fully Insured Shipping
shipping.description: Complementary worldwide shipping via premium couriers, fully insured for your peace of mind.

heritage.title: Heritage Stewardship
heritage.description: Expertly preserved timepieces that maintain their historical integrity and investment value.

reviews.name: Alexander Thompson
reviews.text: The precision and condition of the 1968 Omega Seamaster I purchased exceeded all expectations. Exceptional service and authenticity verification.

reviews.name: Julianne Dubois
reviews.text: A truly premium experience. The watch arrived fully insured and the presentation was magnificent. Finding rare unisex pieces here is a joy.

reviews.name: Kenji Suzuki
reviews.text: Tiemdocu.unisex is my go-to for vintage restoration quality. Their master watchmakers clearly love these machines as much as I do.

newsletter.title: Don't Miss a Single Vintage Treasure
newsletter.description: Subscribe to receive early access to our curated weekly drops and horological insights.
newsletter.disclaimer: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.

footer.description: Celebrating the art of time by connecting people, stories, and exceptional vintage watches that inspire you to live in the moment, seize opportunities.
